verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's never been a day
Like this day to me,
There's never been a day
Like this day I see,
There's never been a light
That shines so bright
As this day, this glorious day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For Christ is revealing
Himself unto me
He's opened my eyes
and now I can see
His word has become
a reality in this day
this glorious day.
